General Academic Study.YOLO Definition: YOLO (You Only Look Once) is a state-of-the-art, real-time object detection system that uses a single neural network to predict bounding boxes and class probabilities directly from full images in one evaluation. It frames object detection as a regression problem, offering high speed and accuracy.
